snippet.title: Blankos Block Party | Developer Chat | Gamescom 2020
snippet.description:
Mythical's Director of Community Justin Kruger and Senior Level Designer Josh Foreman show you how to create, share and tweak your levels on the fly in Blankos Block Party, a new multiplayer open world game coming to PC in 2020. Reserve your account NOW for the chance to join the upcoming beta: https://get.blankos.com/c/o7ihf6 

#playblankos

SUBSCRIBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvRu...

Connect with Blankos Block Party:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playblankos/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayBlankos 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playblankos/ 

About Blankos Block Party:
Blankos Block Party is the debut title from Mythical, a next generation game technology studio led by game industry veterans who helped develop major franchises including Call of Duty, World of Warcraft, Guitar Hero and Skylanders.

This free-to-play game takes place in an inclusive multiplayer world styled like a giant block party, where friends can meet, go on dares with pals, take on daily challenges and more. 

In the rich and vibrant online world of Blankos Block Party, where imagination is the only limit, players can build what they want to play and share with friends, as they collect and customize digital vinyl toys called Blankos. Players will fully own the Blankos they buy with no need for grey markets or lootboxes; the community dictates the value of what they buy and sell.
